location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, Currently at Kazroon [Kāzerūn], to Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter concerns a firmaun [firman] from the Prince of the Persian Government, regarding Mahomed Nebbe Khan [Muhammad Nabi Khan, former Governor of Bushire]'s ship, the Rhaimshaw(written elsewhere as Rhaim Shah). William Bruce informs Babington that he is on his way to Shiraz for the adjustment of Mahomed Nebbe Khan's accounts.
